about_the_game:
In the fantastical, modern metropolis of Some City, California, Jacob discovers his powers at age fifteen with the help of five immortals known as "The Select Few". 

Having fought in almost all of Earth's historic wars, saving and protecting mankind, the aging Select Few now command Jacob to team up with his four best friends, and together, they become "The Elect Few". But convincing them to embrace their untapped supernatural power, stay united, and accept the mantle of saving the world is all but easy. Perilous events bring Jacob to battle a recurring villain in order to save his friends and together become Supreme Heroes.

A twist on Roguelike Action RPGs, being set in Modern-Day and involving Gunplay in combat, as well as Magic Projectiles in the form of Short Spells, Medium Spells, and Long Spells. It all depends on what Empyrean weapon you currently have equipped.

Each Empyrean weapon comes with a vast array of stats, from swing styles, combos, and stances, to magic casting and defensive abilities. From unique names and histories, to their tremendous enchantment of your armor, allowing you to don a new suit with every new weapon and channel the spirits of the blades' previous wielders on the fly, enabling you to chain together nearly unstoppable combos against your enemies!

Find or craft your arsenal and become a Supreme Hero!

Crafting helps you forge your weapons after you obtain the proper minerals. You can also buy and sell goods to help you craft the Empyrean swords, hammer, spears, axes, or daggers you're looking for!

The ways you can access your arsenal are designed for every style of player:

  • At the appropriate level, you can Quick Swap between 5 default weapons, but as you gain more experience, you gain access to 8 more uniquely enchanted weapons you can Quick Swap through. 

  • The Inventory, once unlocked, shows you all the weapons in the world of Supreme Heroes you can eventually have. Once you find them, they'll be ready for your viewing and selection. The Inventory lets you preview your new set of armor with each new blade you equip. You can also see that weapon's power level and a brief description of its stats.

  • The Hot Bar method lets you have a more persistent and customizable menu where you can move or replace crafted weapons straight from your collection menu to your Hot Bar slots however you want. 

Explore the fantastical modern metropolis via your Cytron Motorcycle until you can level up and Fly across rooftops or Wall-Run up skyscrapers, finding loot for crafting and lurking enemies. Picked up documents will populate your Help database with lore and info about items and enemies. With your Map, you can Fast Travel between discovered landmarks or place markers for taking the scenic route with your trusty Cytron.

Learn the way of the Heroes by retrieving and retaining Orbs (your primary source of strength).

Orbs are everything! Use them to unlock new Advances (Skills). Always be mindful of your Orb Gauge (Mana) and Orb Vitality (Health). Should your opponent ever manage to deal damage to you, you'll lose Orbs, robbing you of your very essence!

Retrieve lost Orbs and dropped Orblettes to maintain vitality and, more importantly, to maintain your only method of unlocking new skills. Each hit drains from both your Orb Vitality and your Orb Gauge, making Magic use much more difficult. You may also gain or lose Orbs depending on the public's perception of you.

Between your arsenal, your crafting, and your abilities, you should be well-equipped for the world of battle that lies ahead...

name: Supreme Heroes

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 5600X 6-Core 3.7 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2080 Super 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 68 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 9 3950X - Ryzen 9 3rd Gen 16-Core 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 3090 24GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 68 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD for faster load speeds

short_description: A Fantasy Action RPG. "We're neither humans, nor spirits. We're the bridge between the two. We are immortals within mortal bodies. Our given name is Select Few. We had a beginning and an ending to our misguided ways. Had we not been chosen for such a task, we would've met the end of our days."
